name: Carter's Crates
description:
Description:
It’s Carter’s shift! The crates just keep on coming. Carter’s job is to organize the crates and send them down the chute of the matching color. Don’t let the crates pile up to the ceiling, or Carter might get in trouble with the boss.

Jam Details:
This game was made in 2 days for the Ludum Dare 42 Compo in August of 2018. The theme of the jam was "Running out of space." The game received the following rankings:

Category Rank (out of 1054 entries) Score (out of 5) Overall 1323.765Fun 853.804Innovation 1653.559Theme 504.216Graphics 1813.706Audio 2683.15Humor 2432.72Mood 2863.085
